question: At which of the following sessions, the Indian National Congress adopted a significant resolution against the use of Indian troops in China, Mesopotamia and Persia?
explanation: The Madras session of INC was presided over by M.A. Ansari in the year 1927. During this session INC passed a resolution against the use of Indian troops in China, Iran, Parsia and Mesopotamia. Resolution of boycotting the Simon Commission was also passed and the adoption of the resolution of Purna Swaraj took place.
